title: Set alias for columns not reflected in expression builder
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the aliases.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the aliases set for the columns should be displayed instead of the old column names.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new datasource and a dataset. 2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. The aliases of the columns should be shown instead of the old column names.
